Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This extraordinary item carries a unique value of $15000 to me, encapsulating years of innovation and dedication. I am offering this exceptional piece to you at an exclusive price of $14000. This is an opportunity to own a masterpiece that not only serves its intended purpose but also adds a touch of prestige and exclusivity to your collection. Please let me know if you would like to explore this offer further. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
